html:
Library Book Issue Receipt

Member Name: {{ frappe.db.get_value("Library Member", doc.member, "member_name") }}

Email: {{ frappe.db.get_value("Library Member", doc.member, "email") }}

Book Name: {{ frappe.db.get_value("Library Book", doc.book, "book_name") }}

Author: {{ frappe.db.get_value("Library Book", doc.book, "author") }}

Issue Date: {{ frappe.format(frappe.db.get_value("Library Transaction", doc.name, "issue_date")) }}

Return Date: {{ frappe.format(frappe.db.get_value("Library Transaction", doc.name, "return_date")) }}

{% if frappe.db.get_value("Library Transaction", doc.name, "status") == "Overdue" %}
Your book is Overdue
{% elif frappe.db.get_value("Library Transaction", doc.name, "status") == "Returned" %}
Your book has been Returned
{% else %}
Your book is Issued
{% endif %}

Library Name | Address | Contact Information
name: Library_print_formate
